explains: v. 制造，加工（manufacture 的过去式）
wordGroup: manufactured goods 制成品；产成品
manufactured product 工厂制品；制成品
manufactured gas 人造煤气，工业煤气

sentences.en: Manufactured glass is made by fusing various types of sand.
sentences.cn: 人造玻璃是通过熔合不同种类的沙子制造出来的。

sentences.en: Vitamins cannot be manufactured by our bodies.
sentences.cn: 维生素不能由人体来生成。

sentences.en: We want the machine manufactured to our own spec.
sentences.cn: 我们要求这台机器按我们自己的规格来制造。
